title: Tab Order
author: Steve0212a
body_snippet:
I would like a new option in the options to have the tabs open in the order they are specified in the connection tree.  We have the ability to order the connections in the tree.  I would then like the open tabs to be in the same order.  This would be another option besides "open new tab to the right of the current tab".

## Expected Behavior

iterations.description: Feature request to add a tab ordering option that keeps tabs sorted in connection tree order, complementing the existing 'open to right of current tab' option.

notes:
AI triage (claude): Feature request to add a tab ordering option that keeps tabs sorted in connection tree order, complementing the existing 'open to right of current tab' option.
Approach: Add a new tab ordering mode enum (TreeOrder) alongside existing behavior. When opening a connection, find its position in the connection tree, then insert the tab at the corresponding sorted position among already-open tabs. Add a radio/checkbox option in Options > Tabs & Panels page.
